731053f-d.title: Bridges - Vernon Boulevard Bridge - [Newtown Creek.]
731053f-d.text:
Vernon Boulevard Bridge, spanning 'ewtown Creek and connecting Long -sland City, ueens, with greenpoint, Brooklyn. The bridge was built in 1904. Views 1 and 2 show the Brooklyn side of the bridge; views 2 and S
are east along the creek.
Views 1,2:  Eugene L. Armbruster Collection  1922
Views 3,41  P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS  View 3: 1930
View 4: 1936

731054f-a.title: Bridges - Vernon Boulevard Bridge - [Newtown Creek.]
731054f-a.text:
Vernon Boulevard Bridge, over Newtown Creek, linking Greenpoint, Brooklyn, with Long sland City (left), Queens. The view is up the
creek.
P. L. Sperr  View 1: November 3, 1930
NO REPRODUCTIONS  View 2: October 25, 1936
